ecopedia.summary: A general overview of the current economy that contains information such as available trades, work parties, and contracts.
ecopedia.section: The Economy Viewer provides a general overview of the current economy and is an incredibly useful tool for economic participation. Among other users, the Economy Viewer shows the location of every [StoreItem] and what is currently being bought and sold.

The Economy Viewer provides detailed information about the following:
- Current [Trade] offers - Existing [Work Parties] and their status - Any [Contracts] that are posted - Locations of [Public Crafting Stations|Crafting Component] - Information on existing [Currencies|Currency]
In additon, the Economy Viewer allows citizens to directly transfer currency to other citizens and quickly check the status of their own [Bank Accounts] and any outstanding debts.
The Economy Viewer can be accessed by clicking the Economy button located at the bottom right of the screen.
